alert.note: Alert for Hettinger; Stark (North Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued August 01 at 9:52PM CDT until August 01 at 10:30PM CDT by NWS Bismarck
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1030 PM CDT/930 PM MDT/ FOR NORTHEASTERN HETTINGER...NORTHWESTERN MORTON... SOUTHEASTERN STARK AND NORTHWESTERN GRANT COUNTIES... At 951 PM CDT/851 PM MDT/, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 9 miles south of Hebron to 13 miles west of Heart Butte Dam to 8 miles east of Mott, moving southeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect considerable tree damage. Wind damage is also likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. These severe storms will be near... New Leipzig around 905 PM MDT. Elgin and Heart Butte Dam around 915 PM MDT. Carson around 935 PM MDT. Other locations impacted by these severe thunderstorms include Heil and Leith. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: Prepare immediately for large hail and damaging winds. People outside should move to a shelter, inside a strong building and away from windows.
